code: var dateGenerator=function dateGenerator(dateString){var date=new Date(dateString);return"".concat(formatDateNumber(date.getDate()),"/").concat(formatDateNumber(date.getMonth()+1),"/").concat(date.getFullYear()," l\xFAc ").concat(formatDateNumber(date.getHours()),":").concat(formatDateNumber(date.getMinutes()));};var formatDateNumber=function formatDateNumber(int){if(int<10){return"0".concat(int);}else{return"".concat(int);}};var openTab=function openTab(url){window.open(url,'_blank').focus();};var autoLabel=function autoLabel(key){switch(key){case"INITIALIZING":return"Khởi động";break;case"STARTED":return"Bắt đầu";break;case"PROGRESS":return"Thực hiện";break;case"RELEASE":return"Triển khai";break;case"FINAL":return"Cuối cùng";break;case"COMPLETED":return"Hoàn thành";break;case"BUG":return"Lỗi";break;case"SUSPEND":return"Tạm dừng";break;default:return"Khác";break;}};function titleCase(str){return str.toLowerCase().split(' ').map(function(word){return word.replace(word[0],word[0].toUpperCase());}).join(' ');}var auto_id=function auto_id(){return'id'+new Date().getTime();};export default{dateGenerator:dateGenerator,openTab:openTab,titleCase:titleCase,autoLabel:autoLabel,auto_id:auto_id};
